name: Ancient Greek Gods Temple Battlemaps
description:
If you're going for 10-12 labors, participate in some ancient games, conquer or need a place to make a wish to your god, check out this bundle. Ancient Greek Gods are waiting for you to offer something dear in exchange for a favor, or whatever your DM decides!

Battlemap properties:

Resolution: 3500x4900px @ 140 DPI
Grid: 25x35 @ 140px
Variations: Sun God, Foundry God, Goddess of Hunt, God of Death, Sea God and Empty Temple
Versions: Day and night

Total: 24 maps
